21-022SC.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Sustainable City Commission meeting of Thursday, June 24, 2021Chair Wheeler spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner Tolkoff, seconded by Commissioner Gonzales, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 10 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Eric Rock, Alan Tolkoff, Coby Skye, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan WheelerExcused: 1 - Sona Coffee2.

21-023SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from the Long Beach Fleet Services Bureau on Progress and Plans Towards a Green Fleet and Sustainability Initiatives.Chair Wheeler spoke.Courtney Chatterson, Communications Specialist, spoke.Dan Knapp, Fleet Services Manager, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Wheeler spoke.Commissioner Rock spoke.Commissioner Tolkoff spoke.Dan Knapp, Fleet Services Manager, spoke.Commissioner Tolkoff spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Tolkoff and Dan Knapp, Fleet Services Manager. A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Bergeron-Birge and Dan Knapp, Fleet Services Manager.Chair Wheeler spoke.Courtney Chatterson, Communications Specialist, spoke.Chair Wheeler spoke.A motion was made by Vice Chair Gaytan, seconded by Commissioner Tolkoff, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 10 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Eric Rock, Alan Tolkoff, Coby Skye, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan WheelerExcused: 1 - Sona Coffee3.
